title: Brunei Sultan makes official visit to Vietnam
description:
HANOI: State President Luong Cuong hosted an official welcome ceremony in Hanoi on Monday (Dec 1) morning for the Sultan of Brunei Hassanal Bolkiah, who is on a three-day state visit to Vietnam.

Following the welcome ceremony, the two leaders held talks to review the results of cooperation between ...

title: PM Modi embarks on 3-day visit to Brunei, Singapore
description:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday embarked on a three-day official visit to Brunei Darussalam and Singapore.

He is first visiting Brunei Darussalam at the invitation of Sultan Haji Hassanal Bolkiah from September 3-4. After that, he will travel to Singapore at the invitation of Lawrence Wong,...

title: Brunei reaffirms commitment to stable global oil market
description:
BANDAR SERI BEGAWAN: Brunei Darussalam has underscored its commitment to ensuring stability, transparency, and long-term sustainability in the global oil market during the 40th Opec and Non-Opec Ministerial Meeting (40th ONOMM) held virtually on Nov 30, 2025.

Minister at the Prime Minister’s Office...

title: Royal Brunei Airlines launches direct flights to Chennai
description: Royal Brunei Airlines, the official airline of the Government of Brunei, has launched direct flights between the capital city Bandar Seri Begawan and Chennai to strengthen ties between the two countries, a top official announced on Wednesday. description:

title: Unemployment rate in rural areas falls to 2.4%, urban down to 5.4%: Survey
description:
Unemployment rate in rural areas falls to 2.4%, urban down to 5.4%: Survey

IANS Written By

The report shows that in rural areas, the unemployment rate decreased from 5.3 per cent in 2017-18 to 2.4 per cent in 2022-23 while for urban areas it declined from 7.7 per cent to 5.4 per cent.
